page.title: 06Claverdon's Policeman
page.content: The police constable who patrols the Claverdon beat is P.C. Thorpe.He patrols his beat seven days a week in a police car.He is based at Henley-in-Arden and his beat covers about fifty square miles in total. The actual area has villages and parishes. They are Claverdon, Wooton-Wawen, Bearley and Preston-Bagot. Claverdon's population is about 3,500. The type of crime that happens is mainly burglaries, stolen cars and damage to property like vandalism.It is a quiet area; not much crime occurs here unlike other areas.There has only been one recent major crime in Claverdon which involved a hostage at a party and an imitation hand grenade. P.C.Thorpe said that it is a quiet beat.
